repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives and Special Collections

did.abstract: Washington State University's Beta Omega chapter of the national Delta Gamma sorority was established in 1946. The collection consists of 18 contractor's drawings of the Delta Gamma sorority house at NE 715 Linden in Pullman, WA
did.physloc: The entirety of this collection is located in MASC's oversized maps cases. (MASC staff use.)

bioghist.p: Washington State University's Beta Omega chapter of the national Delta Gamma sorority was established in 1946. They were initially housed at 906 Thatuna (as of 2013 this location is the parking lot northwest of the old Bookie), and in 1949 moved to a newly constructed building at 603 Linden (Pullman's address system changed in 1972, at which point 603 Linden became 715 Linden). The building was renovated circa 1995, and as of 2013 Delta Gamma remains in that house.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of 18 contractor's drawings, approximately 22"x34" in size, of the Delta Gamma sorority house at NE 715 Linden in Pullman, WA. These were contractor copies, and are stamped with approval notices from city of Pullman inspectors. The drawings were created for a 1995 partial renovation of the sorority house originally constructed in 1949. The collection is 18 drawings: 9 architectural, 4 mechanical, and 5 electrical.

arrangement.p: The collection is maintained in the original contractor's arrangement.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: [Item Description] Delta Gamma House Architectural Drawings, 1994-1995 (Archives 336)
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

accruals.p: The drawings had been held by sorority alumnus Elinor McCroskey since shortly after construction; she gave them to Linda B. Chaplin in 2013, who in turn donated them to the Archives. They were received at the WSU Libraries' Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections on October 17, 2013 as accession UA2013-13.

processinfo.p: This collection was processed on October 17, 2013 by University Archivist Mark O'English.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
